RHighlight.p: The highlight has to be staying in a charming Balinese villa in such a great location, so close to the beach, in Canggu. Enjoy the tranquility whilst spending days around the pool and the romantic ambiance looking out over the candle-lit garden at night.

RSurroundArea.p: You would be missing out if you didn’t visit Hotel Tugu, next door to Kedidi, during your holiday. Touted as ‘a resort that celebrates Indonesian history’ this gorgeous boutique hotel and is stacked with fascinating antiques. The hotel is also an ideal choice for an extravagant but exquisite dinner. The popular Echo Beach, just a two-minute stroll from Kedidi, is a great spot for surfing, sunset drinks or dinner at one of the many restaurants overlooking the beach. Sunday barbecues at Skallywag’s (with live music) are incredibly popular with expatriates and tourists alike: people drive from far and wide to jostle for tables and enjoy slow service, so be sure to book a table as come 6pm they are the most prized real estate on the west coast! Guests at Kedidi have complimentary membership of the Canggu Club (2km from the villa) where, amongst many sports and leisure facilities, there’s an Olympic sized public swimming pool with a kid’s pool and slide, tennis courts and a well equipped gym.

ROverallComments.p:
Villa Kedidi is a little Balinese gem, a classic Bali residence in an area where contemporary villas are popping up quicker than we can visit them. Without being absolute beachfront, Kedidi’s location is as good as it gets in Canggu (due to inflated land prices there are very few beachfront villas in this area). The small, private garden is an oasis in which you can spend your days on the sun loungers and your nights under the floodlit palm and frangipani trees. This, coupled with the candles around the garden lit by the staff each evening, makes for a very romantic backdrop whilst dining or lounging in the main building. Kedidi is more compact than Villa Kakatua, it’s four-bedroomed sister next door, but hiring both villas (they share staff and a management office) would give you enough room to comfortably sleep 14 people (probably a few more if you are holidaying with young children). We found the staff very attentive and professional, and it’s very convenient having a car and driver available with reasonable extra rate as driving in Bali takes some getting used to!
We love staying in Canggu. It’s rapidly becoming one of the most popular areas in Bali, yet it retains a rural charm and there are still a few fields and rice paddies to be found in between the villas. That’s not to say it will be everyone’s preference as there is no shopping or nightlife here (nor any air conditioning in the open-air living areas) – you must travel into Seminyak for this. However Canggu does offer some quaint and varied dining spots along with a rugged surf beach. Taking into account its wonderful location and authentic Balinese ambiance, we think Villa Kedidi offers very good value for money.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: Whilst you can enjoy sports and other satellite channels on the TV in the living room, the only other TV (in one of the guest bedrooms) is set up for watching DVD’s only.

REVIEW.Name: Jacqueline Stoller
REVIEW.ROverallComments: wonderful stay, made special by the lovely and attentive staff. So much more personal than staying in a hotel

REVIEW.Name: Richard ELDRIDGE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kedidi was a fabulous place to stay with a very welcoming, efficient and friendly staff. The meals prepared by the chef were mouth watering and the cleanliness of the rooms was superb. Traffic can be bad into Seminyak but being able to walk to the beach (and the famous echo beach) was a big plus. A wonderful stay for parents, children and grand parents.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Online Management & Rental Bali Online Management & Rental
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Tha villa was great, The staff alot more georgeus, We had a unforgetable momment at this Villa, Its only a few step from Echo Beach, where my children love to play arround.

REVIEW.Name: Cate Bryant
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I'd love to give a raving review of Villa Kedidi however it might mean the next time I want to stay - someone else might have booked it! I'll take the risk...We cannot wait to go back again to enjoy the beautiful surroundings and excellent service. We felt like we were amongst family. Thank you...

REVIEW.Name: Maree Johnson Baruch
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay at Villa Kedida was everything we had hoped for and more! The staff were very friendly and professional. I would highly recommend Villa Kedida.....we can't wait to return!

REVIEW.Name: Philip Ingham
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kedidi was truly beautiful, a tranquil oasis to escape the hustle and bustle of the rest of Bali. The villa was tastefully decorated with beautiful Balinese artifacts yet it was comfortable and homely. Our 3 teenagers enjoyed it too. The layout of the villa meant that we could all have our privacy. Great that there is internet access. The pool was lovely too and large enough to actually swim in. Villa Kedidi's location in Canggu is ideal, situated very close to Echo beach which has great waves if you're a surfer. Loads of great places to eat close by too if you decide that you don't want to eat at home. Food in Villa good but didn't really like to have think about what I wanted to eat the day before.Also didn't like having to say exactly how many pancakes etc I wanted for breakfast. Overall though we really enjoyed our time in Villa Kedidi. Great selection of DVDs for those days or nights when you just feel like staying home. Great little library too.

REVIEW.Name: Berenice Then
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay at Villa Kedidi was everything we could hope for...idyllic, relaxing, scenic and wonderful. We were very well cared for - even pampered! - by the villa staff. We also loved it that the villa is mere minutes walk to the beach. We will definitely go back for more of Bali paradise @ Villa Kedidi!

REVIEW.Name: Sharon Benoiton
REVIEW.ROverallComments: wow! this is a must stay for any friends of family visiting Bali. Its in a beautiful location with transport provided you only have to pay for fuel! that's cheep as in Bali! We have stayed in quite a few places on previous trips and no other is as good as Villa Kedidi!!!! What an amazing place you must see it for your self !

REVIEW.Name: Rayna Asbury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We were a large group and booked both Kedidi and Kakatua. The staff were brilliant - nothing was too much trouble to arrange. Although it was a little way out of the main centres, the drivers and cars were always available to take us wherever and whenever we wished to go. Highly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Larenda Bright
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We fell in love with the villa & more importantly the staff. They could not have done enough for us and our young family & we are truly greatful. The food was amazing and the location just perfect!! We will be coming back next year!!

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Hill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was our third visit to Villa Kedidi and we have just booked again for next year. A great place to enjoy "white space".

REVIEW.Name: Amy Hansen .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a marvelous stay. The staff was great, and the cook was truly extraordinary. She was able to accommodate my son's significant food allergies, which made the stay unique in our experience. The whole villa was lovely, with lots of special touches, and the pool area was fantastic. Thank you for a memorable vacation!

REVIEW.Name: rui sobral
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Nice villa and nice staff close to the ocean.

REVIEW.Name: Cassie Packer .
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A gorgeous villa with amazing staff! The villa was baby friendly, the staff were very accommodating with all of our requests and the chef was brilliant we just loved the food. Overall a great experience thank you!

REVIEW.Name: Sam Blakey
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Probably a once in a lifetime holiday for us. We were a large group of seven and despite this found the villa spacious and we absolutely loved the layout. The beauty, peace and tranquility of the villa actually made our holiday - the icing on the cake, along with the lovely attentive staff, excellent car and driver and the amazing food, courtesy of Novi and Uni. I think we ate at the villa for every meal except for three lunches, for which we were supplied with fabulous picnics. I cannot recommend this villa highly enough.

REVIEW.Name: Carolyn Jane Foulis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Stayed here for 10 nights with our children and their partners and our 10month old grandaughter, the villa was absolutely perfect and the staff well you couldn't have asked for better service, friendliness, courtesy etc etc... Our holiday was made exceptional by these staff and they all loved our grandaughter and she absolutely loved them also. Pity we couldn't stay longer.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Hill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay again. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa McCarthy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Kedidi with our adult children and partners. We loved the ambience, the attentive staff and the food. Villa Kedidi has beautiful garden and pool which is quite an intimate communal space but still giving each bedroom the privacy needed. The beach and cafés are just a short stroll away. We would love to stay there again.

REVIEW.Name: Julie Whybrow
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wonderful villa, wonderful staff, we has a lovely time and would Definately visit again. Thank you very much

REVIEW.Name: Arnaud Staib
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was a real great and huge pleasure to spend one week in Kedidi Villa. the staff is over the top, the location is good, close to the beach. We were 2 families with children, but we could have been 3 family without any problems. Hope to come back one day...

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Chivers
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We were so excited when we entered the gates to Villa Kedidi for the first time. We were greeted by the very friendly staff with a cooling drink and then shown around the property.
The accommodation was extremely comfortable and very clean. The gardens were beautiful and the staff were attentive and friendly.
Our chef made some absolutely delicious breakfasts and the fried chicken we had one night was yummy! We had to order it again another day it was so good.
The use of the car was exactly what we needed being a group of four, and we felt very safe with the driver even though the traffic was sometimes a little scary.
Very close proximity to the beach was great, and the staff were able to give us some ideas about restaurants to visit in the evening.
Overall, our time at Villa Kedidi was extremely relaxing and this was not only due to the beautiful surrounds but also to the excellent staff. I would highly recommend this villa.

REVIEW.Name: Leanne Shimmon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had 4 days at villa kedidi would highly recommend All the staff were fabulous nothing was a problem and The food was beautifully cooked by the wonderful chef Novi . No need for restaurants when you have novi ! Look forward to coming back soon

REVIEW.Name: SALONIKA MITRA
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We simply loved our 4 days at villa Kedidi, and are truly returning with a relaxed holiday glow after all the swimming, massage, lounging by the pool. And most of all eating, Chef Novi Foods deserves a special mention, all staff are so helpful and smiley and nothing was too much trouble. Thank you for a wonderful time.

REVIEW.Name: Natalia Lindley
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great cooking, good and friendly services. There is a fantastic beach not far away from here (15 - 20 minutes walking distance) called Echo Beach. We will certainly recommended this villa to our friends. Thank you to the staff.

REVIEW.Name: Daniel Mole
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was my first time to visit the beautiful Island of Bali. Villa Kedidi was beautiful, enchanting, the surf was incredible but in the end it was the staff that made this my home for the week. Thank you for memories, i will never forget !

REVIEW.Name: Leah Parsons
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a wonderful stay here at Villa Kedidi. The staff were very helpful and polite, and really made our stay special. Thanks to Novi for amazing and delicious dinner.

REVIEW.Name: Kimberly Doyle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a beautiful way to conclude our journey in Bali. Thank you for the service and Hospitality. We will be back !!

REVIEW.Name: Gary Couanis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kedidi was the perfect villa for us for a short stay in Bali. Thank you to all the friendly staff.

REVIEW.Name: David Dougherty
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A huge thanks to the amazing staff at Villa Kedidi for making this one of the most peaceful and relaxing holidays ever. 4 days here felt like 4 weeks and we were instantly relaxed the moment we walked though the gates. Nothing is too much effort for the staff and they are very attentive. The service and food provided by Novi was 5 star and her warmth and attentiveness to guests is second to none, and will be one of the reasons we come back. Thanks again to all the team at Villa Kedidi and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Bryan Box
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an excellent holiday at your delightful villa. we have been exceptionally comfortable and have been well looked after. We love Indonesian hospitality and the staff were excellent. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Stephen Dirou
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We love Bali so much that we traveled all the way from London for a 2 week getaway and as always we don't go home disappointed. The people make Bali such a special place and the villa staff were exceptional to us. When we think of Villa Kedidi, it will be the warm, friendly smiles we remember most. Apologize if i have forgotten any names, but our thanks go to; Putu the Manager, Yuni, Ngurah, Widia, Gede, Novi, Gusti and driver Jackie. We will miss you all.

REVIEW.Name: Eduardo Perez Cejuela
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have spent a wonderful holiday here, Great Villa and Amazing staff !!! People are so lovely, you feel much better than at home. We head back to Europe after six years in Singapore, but we know, we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Sally Ocallaghan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a terrific time and were extremely well looked after by Gusti, Novi, Nengah, Putu the Manager and the team behind the scenes. Novi's food preparation and presentation was excellent and beautifully served by the butlers. We were well looked after by the staff.

REVIEW.Name: Kara Todd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the staff, we had a wonderful stay, the service was excellent. we felt very much at home in the villa. we are very sad to leave.

REVIEW.Name: Shelley Trigg
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We loved our stay at Villa Kedidi. the villa itself is beautiful, spacious and in a wonderful location. easy to get to the surf. But what makes this villa is so special is it's wonderful, attentive, warm staff. They made us felt very at home and relaxed and nothing too much trouble. Ngurah and Yuni's Food was delicious and Gusti + Nengah services was wonderful.

REVIEW.Name: Ajay Srikrishna
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Fantastic 10 days Vacation !! We had an incredible stay, our family had a great time and the main reason was the staff, Putu and his team were absolutely the best. Delicious food, great trips and always service with a smile. Their recommendations were spot on, hog wild and other restaurants, Taman Ayun Temple, Ulun Danu Temple and Tree Top. Thanks for a great time.

REVIEW.Name: Cornelia Boudewijn Vink
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had an amazing stay. Thank you for your help, without you all our stay would not have been so memorable. The food, staffs and services delivered was brilliant. THANK YOU SO MUCH.

REVIEW.Name: Brian Sodi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Truly sad to leave this little piece of paradise here in Canggu. Putu, Nengah and Ngurah have made our stay here very special indeed. Nothing was too much for them, attention to details was outstanding. The food .. wow amazing meals, will miss Ngurah's cooking and our gin and tonic from Nengah. Of all the places we have stayed in Bali, this has been the most special. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

REVIEW.Name: Martin Delco
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for the great service and the delicious food. The trip to Uluwatu was amazing.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Chivers
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Once again the whole team at Villa Kedidi and Villa Kakatua were brilliant! Our stay has been made even more enjoyable with the attentiveness dedication of everyone. The meals have been yummy, the rooms beautifully presented and the gardens spectacular. We have had an amazing, relaxing time here in Bali. A very memorable family holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Kym Pitcher
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful holiday to celebrate Jim’s 70th Birthday. It really couldn’t have been made any better. Staff were always friendly, available and helpful, the food was superb – how good is that beef rendang!! And the villa was presented and maintained (cleaned) impeccably. Thank you all. We are looking forward to next time already.

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for an amazing villa experience that we will never forget ! It was such a great group working here that made our stay so enjoyable. The food was excellent as well. Thank you again and we will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: C Asia Pte., Ltd Villa-Finder.com
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Kedidi for 6 nights stay, the villa is in a great location. The villa staffs are all amazing and Novi’s food and cooking is Excellent. We have thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the staff made it a perfect experience. Thank you all so much.

REVIEW.Name: Vanessa Ho
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had the best holiday ever, surfing and driving and eating the DELICIOUS food cooked by Chef Yuni and Novi. Thank you to all the villa staff for being so patient with our different food requests. We are grateful and enjoyed every bite of food we had, especailly the soto ayam. Thank you again, and see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I would like to say that we love every minutes on our stay. All the staff was really friendly and helpful all the time, I couldn't have planned a better beach holiday .. it was just perfect. Thank you very much.

REVIEW.Name: Jo Phillips
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Truly memorable stay at Villa Kediri. Our warmest thanks to Putu and his team for being so helpful, friendly, attentive and polite. Such a high quality staff and what makes holiday so special. Great food and the villa was kept beautifully clean. We will definitely return one day.

REVIEW.Name: Jo Tighe
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a fantastic time at the villa, many thanks to Putu, Novi and all the staff for making it a memorable holiday. What a fantastic stay, awesome pool and so relaxing. So friendly and accommodating. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: Ramon Cummins
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great stay and memorable. Thank you for all the team. See you next time.

REVIEW.Name: Hui Lin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff at Villa Kedidi and Kakatua was truly attentive and friendly. The BBQ dinner that we had in the villa was delicious. We had a great time here on our company retreat and sorry for all the mess we made!! We will be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Lisa Hill
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Lots of stormy weather, but we still had amazing time. Very sad to find that our beautiful sanctuary of is now overlooked by the Aston. Novi cooked amazing meals for us and we have been thoroughly spoiled.

REVIEW.Name: Carolyn Jane Foulis
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Another great stay in Villa Kedidi, The staff as usual are amazing, food great thanks to Novi. This area has changed so much since we were here three years ago but still a great place to stay. Until next time thank you to all.

REVIEW.Name: Villalet Pty Ltd Villalet Pty Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful place, thank you especially to Putu, Nengah, Ngurah, Dika, Yuni, Novi, Yudi and Dewa were what made our holiday so wonderful. You are so lucky to have such a special people working for you. They went above and beyond for me and my family. So great with the children. We would love to come back and see them again; we will miss there smiling faces. Thank you to you all.

REVIEW.Name: Jason Neville Pearce
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow.. What a fabulous time spent at this villa. Service was amazing; Putu and your staff were fantastic and thank you for making our stay so enjoyable. We will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Gustavo Hildenbrand
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Another amazing experience at Villa Kedidi! Everything was absolutely perfect and great. Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Rakhee Dodhia
REVIEW.ROverallComments: wonderful villa and wonderful staff, thanks!

REVIEW.Name: Nicholas Hadow
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A charming compound in classic style with all mod-cons. Staff helpful and willing. Good, safe driver, which is necessary. Quiet location for the time being. Would certainly use again.

REVIEW.Name: Salamonsen Wayne
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The staff were friendly, professional and very accomodating. The Villa itself as lovely, will a fantastic pool and nice bedrooms. The kitchen itself is fairly poor compared to the rest of the Villa, but given it comes with a chef you hardly ever step into it and hence it was not really a concern.
The location is nice and quiet and just near the beach with great surfing and the provision of a driver made going elsewhere very easy.
I'd thoroughly recommend the Villa to anyone else thinking of booking it.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a fantastic stay at Kedidi Villa, The staff were excellent, extremely friendly and helpful. The meals that Yuni provided and cooked for us were outstanding. Putu and Dika were fantastic too.

REVIEW.Name: Stewart Lindsay
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It has been a fantastic holiday for 2 weeks here at Villa Kedidi, to be honest we don't want to leave and we are sure to come back. Yuni's food was absolutely delicious and her suggestions hit the spot. The entire team makes the difference and we will miss you all. Putu, many thanks for showing us the hidden canyon and explain to us so much about the Balinese Culture. Keep in touch.

REVIEW.Name: Catherine Mary Brady
REVIEW.ROverallComments: There are few words to extend our appreciation for the exceptional service extended by the staff of this beautiful villa. We had the best time here and the happy disposition of staff and willingness to help us all the times really made our stay comfortable. Special thanks to Putu, Novi, Erna and Nengah who are simply the best. This is our second time here and we will be back. Thank you for the wonderful food and happy service.

REVIEW.Name: Debra Jean Rhyon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for such a wonderful stay at Villa Kedidi, The villa is beautiful, thank you to all the staff for cooking us delicious meals and driving us to different places, recommending cafes, and catering to our every needs. You all have made the villa feel like home for 5 days.

REVIEW.Name: David Finnimore
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We don't want to go home! Have had an amazing 2 weeks in Indonesia, topped off with 5 great days here at Villa Kedidi, such a relaxing spot, so close to all the shops and surf, lots of inviting spots around the villa as well to just hung out an relax as well. Our many thanks to all the awesome staff as well that made us feel so welcome, love their smile and warmth, which just added to a great holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Steve Andrew Sloane
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff makes this villa and our holiday fantastic. We cannot thank you enough for your hospitality. Novi your food is amazing; we look forward to booking with you again soon.

REVIEW.Name: Chloe Suffren
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you, thank you and thank you. We absolutely loved our stay at Villa Kedidi, it is such a lovely spacious villa but the staffs are what make the experience really special. I am not sure how am I going to survive without them, thank you also for putting up with our wild children! We will be back for sure.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Gotts
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have just had the most amazing two weeks at Villa Kedidi. The food was amazing and the staffs have spoilt us, so not looking forward to going home. Thank you to everyone who made our holiday here so special.

REVIEW.Name: Sinead Patricia Griffin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To all the team at Villa Kedidi, thank you for an amazing week. Your hospitality is second to none, you really looked after us and we had a wonderful experience. The food was amazing and so tasty - especially suckling pig. You have helped provide us with memories that will last forever. We will miss you all and see you all again next time.

REVIEW.Name: Kristy Ferguson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our family had a wonderful holiday experience at Villa Kedidi. We were collected at Sanur in a comfortable dedicated luxury minivan and driven directly to the villa in Canggu. Upon arrival we were greeted by the friendly and professional staff and shown the fantastic facilities within the Villa. The grounds were immaculately presented and all rooms were spacious, adorned with beautiful local arts and luxuriously equipped. The staffs were attentive without being intrusive and made our time in Villa Kedidi a pleasure. The location of the Villa is very convenient for visiting most of the local attractions as it is within 500 meters of the main beach. The proximity to central Canggu and the availability of dedicated transport made extremely easy for our large family to go to Old Mans, Finns Beach Club, Splash Water Park, Panama Restaurant, Fish Bone, Beetle nut Café and La Laguna. We could not fault the presentation, cleanliness or utility of the villa.

REVIEW.Name: MANDAR WALKE
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Kedidi was a dream comes true, we couldn’t have asked for anything better than this. The villa is so much better in reality than in the pictures. We loved every bit of the villa, from the bale and swimming pool and to the little things like the furniture, stone carving, decorations and design. It certainly has a warmth and positive feel. What made this stay so wonderful was the exceptional welcoming hospitality of the staff, a special thank you to all members including our Villa Manager Putu and his staff Agung, Yudi, Yuni and Nengah as well as anyone else we might have missed. We are going to miss Villa Kedidi and the entire staff. Looking forward to visiting in the near future. Thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: Rebeca Garcia-Miguel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have had such a wonderful holidays. The villa is beautiful and the staff is amazing. We have been in many nice place around the world but feeling like home is not easy. We will be back for sure so don't say good bye, only see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Mary Catherine Devine-Fox
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have just spent 5 wonderful days based in Villa Kedidi. Villa Kedidi is a favorite of the Elite Havens CEO and I was happy to take his recommendation with my 2 boys. The facility is sweet, cozy and just the right size for 3. It is the staffs that make it work best, we were looked after so well by Putu, Dika Yuni, Novi and Agung. Putu was exceptional at arranging waterbom, double six beach and rafting. The cooking was excellent and no requests denied. We loved the layout as many comfortable places to relax, super location for beach, good restaurants and access all around the island. We also found the décor very charming and outdoor bathrooms very inviting. Overall a great little find for easy getaway with my boys and would be happy to return. Wishing all the staff good health and happiness in their jobs.

REVIEW.Name: Rachel Power
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to the staff here of this stunning villa for taking such a good cares of us all on our girl’s holiday. The service has been amazing and everyone here has made our time here really special. Putu has been the most incredible host and I would like to say a huge thank you for taking such a good care of me when I got a Bali belly on my second day. Will definitely be back and for longer next time.

REVIEW.Name: Benjamin Pix
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most relaxing and tranquil getaway, we had a wonderful time. The surrounding area are absolutely beautiful and staff all went to every efforts to ensure we enjoyed our stay. We would like to extend extra special thanks to Yuni for her fantastic food and for all of the extra effort and care. We would love to return one day soon.

REVIEW.Name: Amy Lim
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you all for a fantastic holiday and amazing service, amazing food and an amazing team. Providing superlative services and hospitality. Best wishes for 2018 and we hope to see you again in the not distant future,

REVIEW.Name: Kara Jean Mcdermott
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for such a wonderful and relaxing stay at Villa Kedidi. The staff went out of their way to assist us in any way possible. The food was amazing exactly the break we needed. We will be back as soon as possible.

REVIEW.Name: Anna Elizabeth Kelly
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Big thanks to all the staff at Villa Kedidi and Villa Kakatua for a wonderful week. It’s a wonderful maintained accommodation in a magical garden. We really appreciate all the efforts made to care for and look after and advise our 3 families. The foods were amazing and the afternoon or evening drinks were a highlight. Thank you again for everything you did for us and allowing us to have an amazing holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Gustavo Hildenbrand
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It was our 3rd times at Villa Kedidi, and this was really great. The villa here is beautiful and the staff is always amazing. As usual the food prepared by Novi was great. Terima kasih.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for having us stay at Villa Kedidi. We enjoyed the villa style living, especially the pool in the center. It also so close to the beach for surfing and close to all the things we needed. The food has been amazing and the service provided has been outstanding. Also the staff and the team here are so lovely and friendly to all my children.

REVIEW.Name: Zac Brabin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to the staff of Villa Kedidi, this was our first stay in Canggu and you guys made it amazing for us. Your services and hospitality was fantastic, we appreciate it so much. We had such a relaxing and joyful stay. We will definitely be back again.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Tours Bali Tours
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have thoroughly enjoyed our time here at Villa Kedidi, the services, the foods and staff have been amazing. We have relaxed and rested in these beautiful surroundings. We would love to make this a regular spot to visit. Thank you all for looking after us so very well.

REVIEW.Name: Caroline Seymour
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have been very impressed with Villa Kedidi, from the moment we arrived the staff have been extremely friendly and helpful. The food has been amazing, the beds extremely comfortable and the outside bathrooms to each room are all just as a amazing as each other. A great place to wind down and relax during the days. We will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great team! Fantastic service from the moment we stepped into Villa Kedidi, we felt at home. Thank you for the wonderful stay. We hope to return a longer stay next time.

REVIEW.Name: Robyn Plessing
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay at Villa Kedidi, thank you to all the fabulous staff who looked after us so well. Big thank you to Yuni for the beautiful food she prepared. It was delicious. Thank you to Nengah and Agus also, two terrific young men both are friendly, helpful and welcoming. Thank you Putu, the villa is gorgeous and very well maintained and serviced. Our best wishes to everyone at Villa Kedidi.

REVIEW.Name: Tanya Mclean
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Just lovely, thank you to the warm and friendly staff for their hospitality. Our stay in this villa was lovely and just what we need. See you next time.

REVIEW.Name: Edward George Mustin
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a lovely team and super friendly, They were very welcoming and kept our villa very clean and a warm homely place to stay. We can’t wait to come back and Villa Kedidi will be our first choice. Thanks again and best wishes.

REVIEW.Name: Willem Leo Bonekamp
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We had a wonderful stay, the staff is excellent and very helpful. We wish we could stay here forever. The food is excellent and we recommend Novi’s cooking talent to everyone. Thank you for facilitating our special day.

REVIEW.Name: Asia Good Living
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you very much for making our stay at Villa Kedidi unforgettable. We enjoyed every moment of it, Novi’s cooking was delicious. The staff great, attentive without being intrusive. Absolutely loved our stay and are now going back home truly relaxed, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Elisabeth Agatha Cornelia Heeremans
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Awesome house, great and friendly staff, it was a very relaxing stay. The food we had at the villa was spectacular. I will never be able to forget - the food was fantastic. Relaxing, friendly, peaceful - that’s Bali at his best.

REVIEW.Name: Summar Lee Sargent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Our stay here at Villa Kedidi has been truly amazing. We have been fortunate to spent 6 nights here and the staff have provided the best service that has contributed to making our family holiday one of the best we have ever experienced.There is no doubt that we will be back to visit again as soon as we can.

REVIEW.Name: Airbnb (15.5)
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most fantastic stay at Villa Kedidi. The staff and their hospitality make the stay outstanding. You cannot fault Novi, Dika and the other staff. They were also wonderful with our daughter Isabelle. Such a relaxing time and delicious food. Thank you again for making our stay so enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Andrea Robinson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for our wonderful holiday at Villa Kedidi, it has been amazing. Everything I hoped for and more. The villa and gardens are so beautiful, a tropical oasis from the hustle and bustle of Canggu. But most of all are the amazing staff, which makes a stay at the villa such a memorable and relaxing experience. Putu, Nengah and Erna have looked after us so well and the amazing Yuni, food was so delicious and I will always remember your beautiful smiling face. I will cherish the memories of my 50th birthday holiday. Thank you all.

REVIEW.Name: Antonia Albanese
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best girls holiday ever! Thank you to all the amazing staff at Villa Kedidi, you made us feel so welcome. Home away from home and we will be back for sure.

REVIEW.Name: Nicole Marie Amad
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all of the wonderful staff at Villa Kedidi, we have all had a very relaxing stay and have much appreciated your great service.

REVIEW.Name: Sophie Hannah Scott
REVIEW.ROverallComments: These guys are the best. Refused to leave the villa until Novi gave me her banana pancake recipe. Such a beautiful place filled with beautiful people. Having our wedding in Canggu has been so special and we will be back soon.

REVIEW.Name: Deepika Jain
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was the best decision to stay in a villa instead of a hotel and the whole family is so thankful. All were well taken care of from grandparents to kids to babies. The villa was extremely clean and well maintained. We highly appreciated mosquito treatments every morning. In terms of cooking, Novi blew us away with her breakfast eggs and best BBQ ever. Thanks to entire staff and Putu the manager for taking care of our every request. Thank you for a great vacation.

REVIEW.Name: Sarah Jane Lockwood
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have enjoyed and totally relaxing experience here at Villa Kedidi and this is down to the wonderful staff and have made us very lazy. Novi's Balinese cooking is delicious and very unlikely to be replicated successfully at home. Canggu has been a great destination for the final few days of our Bali holiday and the villa is perfectly located. Thank you to all of the staff involved with Kedidi for making our stay here so easy and enjoyable.

REVIEW.Name: Victoria Ann Leaver
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The best week and girls escape to celebrate Victoria turning 50. Words which spring to mind - amazing location, staff, food, accommodation, pool, beds and company. Food - phenomenal, we asked our wonderful chef Novi and Yuni to cook traditional Balinese dishes for us. We were not disappointed, food presentation has been exceptional. We highly recommend Balinese food being the feature of the menu. Relaxing - we slept like a babies, caught up on a year of sleep.

REVIEW.Name: Rochelle Nagy
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Wow, we needed to stay longer, the villa is amazing and the location is the best. The staff are second to none. Novi did well with the beautiful foods, we want to take her home. We will definitely come back and thank you for making our stay unforgettable.

REVIEW.Name: Peter Matthew Cohen
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a delight to stay here again (last year we stayed at Villa Kakatua, this time at Villa Kedidi). The villa is lush and well appointed and a great lay out for families. The staff are amazing, attentive, without being intrusive. Fabulous location, close to the beach, shops and restaurants. Novi makes the best pancakes ever and their mojitos by the pool are first rate. Thank you to the team at Villa Kedidi for looking after us so well, we were absolutely so spoilt and had a fabulous time.

REVIEW.Name: Hanson Masih
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Firstly a heartfelt thank you to all staff for a great stay. The Balinese way is a culture underpinned by a true respect. This indeed is paradise and we would highly recommended Villa Kedidi to all.

REVIEW.Name: Jane Alison Toole
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to all the staff, we have had a wonderful stay at Villa Kedidi, the food was delicious – Enak. The pool was nice and warm, it felt like a warm silk blanket. I love the water fountain and the statue.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Family Villas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Suksma to the wonderful, kind and thoughtful team at Villa Kedidi - Putu, Yuni, Nengah and Oka. We had a really perfect week here in Canggu and are sad to leave this beautiful oasis. Yuni’s food was amazing especially our favorite waffles, spring rolls and nasi goreng. We can’t speak highly enough of Villa Kedidi and thank you so much.

REVIEW.Name: PURI ASIA ASIA
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Selamat siang kepada semua management dan staff Villa Kedidi, terima kasih atas kebaikan staff anda untuk jagain kami. Sangat friendy dan helpful, lokasi yang sangat bagus dekat pula dengan pantai, tempat bersih dan nyaman.

REVIEW.Name: Maria Teresa Palmer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for a wonderful stay, the services and staff were amazing. The villa was perfect for restful break. As our second visit to Bali, we didn’t need to sight see, all we needed was a restful break. The villa is perfect, high quality and the boys loved the pool. We may see you again one day.
